content: mid silver birch leaf green ⇨ note the other make 1 per leaf cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm single leaves are knit in pale pointed needles and mid green yarn start at the yellow and grass green base of the leaf instead of dark yellow row 1 to 4 k3 sl1 wyif make 1 per leaf cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm single row 5 rs l kfb k1 kfb sl1 wyif 6 sts pointed needles and dark yellow yarn start at the base of the leaf row 6 k5 sl1 wyif row 1 to 4 k3 sl1 wyif row 7 kfb k3 kfb sl1 wyif 8 sts row 5 k1 kfb 2 times sl1 wyif 6 sts row 8 k7 sl1 wyif row 6 k5 sl1 wyif row 9 kfb k5 kfb sl1 wyif 10 sts row 7 k1 kfb 4 times sl1 wyif 10 sts row 10 to 12 k9 sl1 wyif row 8 k9 sl1 wyif row 13 knit to last 3 sts k2tog sl1 wyif 9 sts row 9 k1 kfb k2 kfb 2 times k2 kfb sl1 wyif row 14 to 19 repeat row 13 six more times 3 sts 14 sts row 20 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts row 10 k13 sl1 wyif pull through to cast off row 11 k1 kfb k4 kfb 2 times k4 kfb sl1 wyif 18 sts autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 15 of 19 sloe berries row 4 ws purl follow the holly berries patt in darkest blue row 5 k1 kfb k1 7 times k1 23 sts drop the chocolate brown yarn and join pale cream making up make up each berry following the holly berry instructions using darkest blue yarn row 6 purl for stuffing for each leaf weave in cast on/off tails row 7 k1 k2tog k5 3 times k1 20 sts on ws drop the pale cream yarn and pick up chocolate brown snail row 8 purl row 9 k1 k2tog k4 3 times k1 17 sts snail body drop the chocolate brown yarn and pick up pale cream make 1 per snail cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and row 10 purl pale grey yarn start at the tail end row 11 k1 k2tog k3 3 times k1 14 sts row 1 to 16 starting on a rs knit row work 16 break the pale cream yarn and pick up chocolate row in st st brown row 17 k1 kfb k1 4 times 13 sts row 12 p2tog 7 times 7 sts row 18 to 22 starting on a ws purl row work 5 pull through to cast off row in st st row 23 k2tog 6 times k1 7 sts making up for the body sew the side edges decrease pull through to cast off stuffing the head cast off end and lightly stuffing the narrower body and gather the cast on sts decrease at the tail note the seam runs
